1.0.0.name: wordpress/related-posts-via-taxonomies
1.0.0.description:
This Plugin will display the related posts list via categories, tags and custom taxonomies. It can automatically display the related posts list after the content of any single post of selected post types by options. There are many options for the display, order, exclusion and post-type selection. This plugin works when viewing a post of selected post types by options. This plugin requires jQuery 1.6 or higher.

Official Page

  • Plugin's Official Page : English / Japanese
  • Author's Website : alphasis.info (Japanese) » WordPress Plugins
